name: Ruby
heading: Ruby is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language
features: It is a true object-oriented programming language
It is a server-side scripting language similar to Python and PERL.
intro: A dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity. It has an elegant syntax that is natural to read and easy to use.

name: C#
intro: C# (C-Sharp) is a programming language developed by Microsoft that runs on the .NET Framework. C# is used to develop web apps, desktop apps, mobile apps.
heading: C# is a modern, object-oriented, and type-safe programming language.

name: Python
intro: Python is a popular general-purpose programming language. It is used in machine learning, web development, desktop applications, and many other fields.
heading: Python is a popular general-purpose programming language. It is used in machine learning

name: PHP
intro: PHP is a widely-used, open source scripting language · PHP scripts are executed on the server · PHP is free.
heading: PHP is a server side scripting language that is embedded in HTML
features: PHP can generate dynamic page content
PHP can create, open, read, write, delete, and close files on the server
PHP can send and receive cookies
PHP can add, delete, modify data in your database
PHP can be used to control user-access

name: Kotlin
intro: If you’re looking to build an Android app, we highly recommend starting with Kotlin. Take advantage of its best-in-class features. Many developers already enjoy using Kotlin. Mature language. Multiplatform. Online courses. Code safely. Easy to learn. Big community.
heading: A modern programming language that makes developers happier.
features: Top-level objects and the Singleton pattern

name: Java
intro: Java is a powerful general-purpose programming language. It is used to develop desktop and mobile applications, big data processing, embedded system.
heading: The Java™ Programming Language is a general-purpose, concurrent, strongly typed, class-based object-oriented language
features: Object Oriented. In Java, everything is an Object
